## Utils.getRoutesOption() method

Gets the routes option from the `routes module` name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRoutesOption(rmn: string): import("./config").RoutesConfigProperties;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rmn | string | The <code>routes module</code> name |

<b>Returns:</b>

import("./config").[RoutesConfigProperties](./packer.routesconfigproperties.md)

The corresponding routes option
